subject: Testing a Service with JUnit
msgSnippet: I am trying to run some JUnit tests against a service that is started via the main() method. This process must be started before I can run my JUnit test cases.
messageBody:
I am trying to run some JUnit tests against a service that is started via
the main() method. This process must be started before I can run my JUnit
test cases. How do I go about starting that service and then running the
test cases against the running service? Do I use the setUp() method to start
a thread to run the service and then run my test cases?

Thanks,
Bill
